content.rendered:
Suntory is the oldest whisky making company in Japan. Today, it is the country’s largest and most recognizable producer of quality whisky. This Hibiki 35 Years Old Limited Edition is one of the best limited release Suntory has ever made for the Hibiki brand.

The vessel that holds this 35-year-old Hibiki blended whisky is a delicate Kakiemon pottered bottle, crafted by the 14th Sakaida Kakiemon. A Japanese potter, ceramicist and former Living National Treasure in Japan. He was a member of the 14th generation of the Kakiemon Family who continued the tradition of Kakiemon enameled ceramics. A must have for all whisky aficionados!
One of 150 bottle. In wooden Presentation case. Aroma-Beautiful flower bouquet and ripe fruits followed by elegant sherry, woody notes reminiscent of incense, vanilla and honey aromas.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Suntory
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Alcohol Strength: 45
Weight: 2.3 Kg
